aka: When the Clouds Hide the Shadow

cast.name: 玛丽亚·阿尔切 María Alche

awards:
第72届圣塞巴斯蒂安国际电影节(2024)
　　地平线大奖(提名) 何塞·路易斯·托雷斯·雷瓦

亚历山德拉·莫法特 Alejandra Moffat

director.name: 何塞·路易斯·托雷斯·雷瓦 José Luis Torres Leiva

this_title: Cuando las nubes esconden la sombra
trans_title: When the Clouds Hide the Shadow
introduction: Maria travels to Puerto Williams to star in a movie. But the film crew won't be able to arrive due to a strong storm. Alone, she'll seek help for severe back pain, which will lead her to discover life in the southernmost city in the world and a pending story in her life.
foreign_title: Cuando las nubes esconden la sombra
